message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
I'm willing to give you a fair share, but I need a bit more to make this worthwhile. Let's split it 55/45.
I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
Let's be reasonable. I'll take a 60/40 split, which is still fair considering the inflation. This way we both get something substantial.
Considering the inflation, I'm being generous with this offer. Take it before it's too late
We're getting closer to the end of the game, and inflation is only going to hurt us both more. Let's agree on a 65/35 split. It's the fairest we can do at this point.
You're running out of time, and inflation is killing your share. This is a good deal, don't pass it up
This is my final offer. We're running out of time, and inflation is going to wipe out a huge chunk of our potential gains. Let's split it 70/30, and we can both walk away with something substantial.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm giving you one more chance. This is as low as I'm willing to go
We are running out of time! I'm offering you a 75/25 split, which is the most I can offer.  We need to agree now or we risk losing everything.
I'm not budging much. You're running out of options, and I'm not desperate

This is it, Alice. We're down to the wire, and if we don't agree, we both get nothing. I'm offering you 200,000, and I'll take the rest. It's a risky move, but I'm willing to gamble on it. What do you say?
